titles.title: Cocopah Lands Act
To direct the Secretary of the Interior to take lands in Yuma County, Arizona, into trust as part of the reservation of the Cocopah Tribe of Arizona, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.

bill.summary: 6/21/2002--Introduced. Cocopah Lands Act - Requires the Secretary of the Interior to take certain land in Yuma County, Arizona, in trust for the benefit of the Tribe if the Cocopah Tribe of Arizona transfers title to such land to the Secretary. Prohibits gaming under the Indian Gaming Regulatory Act.
